name: Henry Price
about: I am a committed and diligent professional serving as the Senior Technical SEO Lead at Merkle Inc. With nearly six years of experience in the SEO field, I have developed a strong proficiency in data analysis across multiple platforms, including Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and WebpageTest, along with expertise in Screaming Frog, HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. My goal is to transition to an in-house role for Forbes where I can significantly contribute to a website's SEO strategy and take a leadership role in guiding product development from inception to completion.

experience.role: Senior Technical SEO Lead & Web Performance Specialist
responsibilities: Leading a team of 3 technical SEO managers & specialists
Technical SEO Lead for 2 of our biggest clients with a heavy focus on e-commerce (+3m URLs)
Developing a year-long roadmap to improve crawl rate & indexability
Led a full migration project from start to finish (2 years)
Built daily impact reports
Led external and internal training about the importance of technical SEO
Created a digital sustainability offering
Created a CrUX History API tracking tool

experience.role: Technical SEO Lead & Web Performance Specialist
responsibilities: Developing technical SEO strategies for clients
Served as the Technical SEO Operations lead for a client managing 62 websites
Managed large-scale projects for e-commerce sites
Utilized Node.js expertise to develop multiple automation tools
Engineered a fully automated web performance tracking tool
Specialized in technical SEO
Worked across 12 different websites & 4 different platforms
Enhanced team expertise in web performance
Developed an internal JavaScript training program
Directed large-scale technical projects
Spearheaded cross-channel initiatives
Led analytics training within the department
